JOB DESCRIPTION: These candidates must have a minimum of 2 years experience with the Opensource ERP system Odoo (formerly OpenERP), programming Languages Python, PHP, Bash and C and must be skilled in databases Postgresql, Mysql as well as in Jquery, XML and CSS. We are looking for someone:  - with an understanding of Odoo's existing framework  - able to map client's requirements to Odoo and add additional features  - able to develop custom modules in Odoo   - with knowledge of migrating Odoo from one version to another.       Excellent verbal and written command of the English language is essential
